name: The Down and Dirty Guide to Camping with Kids
categories: The Down and Dirty Guide to Camping with Kids
description: Plan a family camping adventure with tips and advice from a seasoned camper and mother of 3. Learn about choosing a destination, packing gear, setting up a campsite, and keeping little ones safe. Also includes simple and tasty recipe ideas, foolproof tactics to keep kids happy while hiking, and creative camp arts and craft projects. A practical guide for anyone heading outdoors with kids, from babies through pre-teens.
